name: Tom Davis
text: R&A was recommended by a friend and so I tried them. Access was easy and the place was very clean and surprisingly no smell of the oysters and dead fish like so many others. Clearly, I was at a processing plant and not a retail outlet. But, everything was handled like a retail store other than I was given a gallon/5 lbs. of oysters shucked TODAY (12-23-20) with a Sell-By date of Jan. 8. I could only get fresher oysters at an oyster bar where they shuck them when I order. As I was about to leave, a guy on a fork lift drove up and asked if I had been helped. I recoginized him from their web site. He was a VP and son of the owner. I look forward to many oysters in the future from R&A.

name: Cynthia Anders
text: These people are wonderful. And caring. They actually waited for me to show up yesterday after a very eventful day. And that really meant a lot to us. Thanks guys an's ladies in the office for relaying my messages so that someone would be waiting. Cary is the only name I remember, but everyone is great there.

name: Tina Singsonexay
text: Very nice people and great oysters!

name: J S
text: I ordered a box of oysters from my local butcher shop for Christmas Eve, not knowing where they would come from. I must say these were the best oysters I’ve had in quite some time, they were very nice size oysters, I would call them medium to large if I had to describe them.   They also were very clean shells, no mud in the hinge. I hope next Christmas Eve is the same.

name: Danny Smith
text: Ordered $300 worth of oysters for our supermarket, 8 boxes at 30lbs each, 240lbs of oysters. Every box was dead, sold maybe 10 pieces total. I called and they told me they give no credit due to the heat but they have no problem selling them this time of year. I will never due business with this company again. I was warned, I should've listened !

resp.text:
Hi, we are just now seeing this so I will reiterate the response we left to your Facebook comment.
When you called to place the order we emphasized that we were having shelf life issues due to the heat. We also explained that we could not issue any credits. This was explained prior to you even coming to pick up the product. I apologize for any trouble, but we were very clear from the start.
